snippet: Beat Hefti and Alex Baumann of Switzerland won a World Cup two-man bobsled competition on Friday in Germany, ending the American pilot Steven Holcomb’s seven-race winning streak.
abstract: Beat Hefti and Alex Baumann of Switzerland win World Cup two-man bobsled competition in Winterberg, Germany, ending seven-race winning streak by American pilot Steven Holcomb; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Beat Hefti and Alex Baumann of Switzerland won a World Cup two-man bobsled competition on Friday in Germany, ending the American pilot Steven Holcomb’s seven-race winning streak.
